May 2022
Complete Personalized Suggested Action by 1 May

Hey Nick!
Some of your team members have indicated that they might consider leaving in the nearest future.

  Key reason — manager

Please, complete the following action to mitigate the risk of attrition (in attachment).

  Potential retention saving — $560,000

This action has been constructed based on employee responses to an earlier survey.
The employees will be surveyed again in two weeks’ time.
Thank you!
Denys Grabchak, CPO
 
This email is a part of an advanced employee retention framework and is intended to help managers retain top performers
